    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(double et)
        Description copied from class: CameraController
        Update the camera's transformation matrix in response to user input. Pairs of keys are available to translate the camera in three direction oriented to the camera, and to rotate around three axes oriented to the camera. Mouse input can also be used to rotate the camera around the horizontal and vertical axes. All effects of these controls are achieved by altering the transformation stored in the SceneCamera that is referenced by the RenderCamera this controller is associated with.
        Overrides:
        update in class CameraController
        Parameters:
        et - time elapsed since previous frame
